title: */*Beautiful and cozy 1 Bedroom apartment in - - Philadelphia.
description: Beautiful and cozy one bedroom with one bathroom unit in two family home. Unit located on first floor, with off street parking, and on the major bus route. Tired of apartment complexes? This is a very private, fully remodeled apartment with traditional older wide woodwork. Galley style Kitchen with dishwasher, newer energy star appliances, cherry cabinets, garbage disposal, and auxiliary corner computer table. Bathroom has tiled walk in shower, pedestal sink, and bathroom fan. Living room has hardwood flooring, and newer over sized thermopane windows to let in plenty of light while keeping out the chill of Syracuse winters. One bedroom with carpeted floors, large closet, and thermopane windows. Unit has programmable thermostat, high efficiency furnace & high efficiency central air conditioning. Building has vinyl siding & exterior lighting. Building located in a safe neighborhood, close to Onondaga Lake Park, a perfect place to run, walk or Rollerblade. Close location to the village of Philadelphia and Nichols grocery store. Located in the Philadelphia Central School District. Many different restaurant options within walking distance like Heid's Hot dogs, the Retreat, Cobblestone, and Limp Lizard to name a few. Close proximity to major highways, with quick 10 minute access to Downtown Syracuse via route 81. And 15 minutes from Syracuse Hancock International Airport. If you would like to rent this listing, shoot your number please.

title: Recently remodeled townhouse in Chestnut Hill!
description:
Recently remodeled townhouse in the amazing location of Chestnut Hill.
From the kitchen with the range hood and granite countertop to the rooftop deck (newly redone, with storm door), this is an impressive place. Spacious and functional, it is move-in ready. You have an assigned parking spot plus "visiting" spots in the community lot.
The location cannot be beat. Short walk to Septa train station (Wyndmoor), shopping plaza that includes a supermarket, pharmacy, and post office, with restaurants galore in the quaint yet lively neighborhood of Chestnut Hill. 3 public libraries nearby. Abundant parks, including the beautiful trails and walking paths of Wissahickon State Park and Morris Arboretum. Chestnut Hill College and Chestnut Hill Hospital are close too, as are great schools such as Springside Chestnut Hill and Norwood-Fontbonne Academy.
We pay the HOA fee (which includes water, sewage, lawn care, and trash). You pay for gas and electricity. The place is already Verizon ready.
We will run background checks. Preferred rent to net income ratio is 1 to 3 (monthly income >$8,500). Lease is for 12 months. One month’s security deposit.

title: New Graduate Hospital 3 Bedroom with Roof Deck
description:
On a quiet block in Graduate Hospital, enter this house to be greeted by a sleek modern aesthetic fabricated from the combination of elegant finishes corresponding in warm tones and hues. This 2,000sqft townhome is a unique build that upon entry alludes to thoughtful design for comfortable living, while remaining a showpiece worthy of entertaining friends and house guests.
White oak hardwood plank floors lead into a living space with entries down to the fully finished basement and up to a chef's kitchen. Stone textured wall leads down a few steps to a living area with lots of light from three tiered windows and a full sized egress door. Down a few more steps you’ll find a huge storage and utility room, full bathroom and washer/dryer closet. Practical and thoughtful layout design makes this space conveniently transformable into an ensuite for any guests to visit. Offering privacy with its own access this space ensures guests can enjoy this space undisturbed, without restricting it to a bedroom area only. It can be utilized comfortably for any den purposes the remainder of the time and it can serve both purposes with ease.
Notice in the chef’s kitchen that again no details were spared when creating a dream cooking space. Beautiful white tile extends from the counters all the way to the ceiling behind the sink and stove areas, an uncommon feature offering longevity to the cleanliness of your workspace. Vent hood above the range and full sized cabinets flank the stainless steel five burner range, equipped with pot filler. Enjoy views and morning light from the double windows above the sink.
Up the open staircase the glass wall offers a clear view of the 2nd floor and boasts some European influence of design flair these builders have developed. Two full sized bedrooms have three windows and full sized closets with built-ins installed. They share a bathroom on this level with textured tile and a stylish green vanity. The entire third floor has a pocket door and is a dedicated primary bedroom suite. The full sized bedroom has more space and extended light. The closest the size of a full nursery is built out to organize and display all of your most cared for possessions. It gets natural light from the bedroom, as well as from the second door leading into a very elegant bathroom. White marble tile from floor to ceiling perfectly complements the small tile used inside the full sized glass shower that includes a giant soaking tub. Double vanities, higher end mirrors and simple fixtures create the most lovely clean environment to prepare for the start and end of your day.
A roof deck with panoramic views of the skyline and a wet bar just inside completes the tour of this great home. Quiet luxury and smooth lines really speak to the quality of workmanship and consciousness of style.
Listing courtesy of Compass Pennsylvania LLC

title: Multiple Units 1 & 2 Bedrooms!  Free Parking!
description:
Thank you for your interest in The Glen at Shawmont Station Apartments. Below is our current availability and pricing. Below you will find information on each available unit as well as pre-recorded virtual tours. If you’d like to apply to any of these units, you can do so at www.theglenphilly.com. Information regarding amenities, utilities and pets are on the the website.
The Glen at Shawmont Station is proud to host various food trucks almost weekly on the property, all are welcome to join us!
The application process is easy.
1. Locate the apartment you want to rent on www.theglenphilly.com and hit “select”.
2. Complete the application on all parts and submit with the $500.00 security deposit and $50.00 application fee.
3. Send proof of income and photo ID to  show contact info
.
4. If approved with good credit your deposit remains $500.00. Approved conditionally the deposit is one month’s rent, the $500.00 initial deposit will go towards that and you would owe the balance at move in. If denied, the deposit is refunded in check form.
5. If you decide our community is not right for you after applying, you have 72 hours from applying to cancel in writing (email) to receive your refund of the $500.00. The deposit is not refundable after 72 hours if you cancel your application.
6. Your gross monthly income (this is income before taxes) must equal three times the monthly rent to be approved. Incomes are combined.
7. Twenty-four hours before move-in, you would pay your admin/city fees of $340.00, any pet fees if applicable and the first month’s rent.

title: Sun-absorbed corner property Northern Freedoms!
description:
Sun-soaked corner property in Northern Liberties! Within the walls of this gorgeous brick townhome, hardwood flooring, natural light, and generous living spaces await you! The inviting living space welcomes you with built-in shelving, warm wood flooring, crown molding, and amazing natural light. The powder room is located right beside this space for convenience. Down the stairs awaits your spacious eat-in kitchen featuring warm wood shaker cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, multiple windows and room for a dining table. The stackable washer/dryer is also within this space. The 2nd floor is home to a large bedroom and 1 full bath. The bright and airy bedroom is complete with hardwood flooring, a large window, closet space and private access to the bath. The tiled bath includes a modern vanity and shower/tub combo. The upper floor features the primary suite with a skylight, walk-in closet and ensuite bathroom. The natural light and warm wood flooring fill the space with ease. The tiled bathroom closely resembles the other with a stylish vanity and large stall shower. Now let's talk location. Perfectly situated in the desirable neighborhood of Northern Liberties, this home is truly by it all. Hot dining spots like Urban Village Brewing Co., Figo, Jery's Bar and SO many more. Every block has something for everyone. Not to mention, North Bowl, The Filmore, Barcade, and others are great date night/weekend spots to indulge in. Easy access to other neighborhoods, suburbs, and NJ with highways and public transport. Do not wait! Schedule your showing before this beauty is off the market!
114 W Wildey St

title: Spaciousness of true loft living! Welcome home!
description:
Welcome to Lofts 640 in the heart of Philadelphia, PA! Your monthly rent includes extended cable TV service, access to our fitness center, indoor/heated pool and hot tub with an attached outdoor roof deck, yoga/fitness studio, cyber lounge, 24/7 front desk attendant and more! As you enter 640 North Broad, you'll step away from the busy street and into an urban space that artfully blends the old with the new. The original character of the building has been enhanced by modern accents and furnishings, creating a unique and sophisticated environment. Our community is vibrant and welcoming, with state-of-the-art amenities designed to nurture both body and spirit. You'll love relaxing in our glass-domed pool house, where the warm salt water pool and Jacuzzi spa offer the perfect respite from the stresses of daily life. Meet and socialize with fellow residents on our rooftop deck lounge, or take advantage of our cyber cafe and yoga studio to stay connected and centered. Our lobby is a work of art, featuring geometric ceiling lights that illuminate the mocha-colored floors. With stunning white and stainless steel accents, the lobby is the perfect introduction to the energy and excitement of Loft 640. Located just six blocks from City Hall on Broad Street, our community is centrally located to shops, restaurants, hospitals, and the thriving community of Fairmount. Reading Terminal Market and the Pennsylvania Convention Center are just minutes away. Living at Loft 640 is the perfect combination of the commuter convenience of center city living and the spaciousness of true loft living. Welcome home!
640 N Broad Street N Broad Street #725

title: Affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square!
description:
Location Location Location! Available 08/1/2023. 20th & Walnut - only a 2 min walk to Rittenhouse Square, bars, restaurants, shops, historic places & more! This building is perfectly situated close to all the best spots in Philly, major universities, highways & whatever you can imagine. 2010 Walnut St was built in 1860 and was originally owned by the Wilkinson Sword Blade family. In recent decades, Eberhardt's Antiques operated out of the first floor. Now it is your chance to rent this amazing, affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square! When you walk into the building, you will be amazed by the preserved historic details and gorgeous mirrors throughout the hallway. The building has a big shared rooftop with sublime views of the city! The apartment is located on the basement level of the building and has a small outdoor space! The details of the building will make every day walking in that hallway feel like a special occasion! The apartment can fit easily all of your furniture and you can comfortably host all of your friends and family. The bedroom has a spacious closet with an organizer, and space for a full/queen bed, desk, dresser, and more. It has stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, central AC & Heating, a beautiful bathroom, and an in-unit washer & dryer! The only con is that there is not much natural light. It will be professionally cleaned before the new tenant's move-in date. Water is included in the rent. Pets are ok with a pet deposit and under 50 pounds. Inquire about the video tour! First, and last & security to move in. 700+ credit score & 3x the rent income required to move in. No Airbnb arbitrage. Inquire about other units that we have available in this beautiful building!
2010 Walnut St #B01

title: You’ll never want to leave your neighborhood!
description:
This unit features an extra room which can be used as an office or an additional bedroom Welcome to your new home, 735 Spruce Street, located in the heart of Philadelphia’s charming and historic Washington Square West neighborhood. This apartment features tall ceilings, a spacious floor plan, plenty of storage space, and oversized windows. Washington Square houses a large collection of historic 18th and 19th-century residential architecture that offers you a glimpse into Philadelphia’s past. A charming district filled with cobblestone streets and brick structures, you will never tire of the wide array of dining, shopping, sightseeing, and museums. Local attractions include Washington Square Park (5-min walk) and Penn’s Landing (along the waterfront), while historic attractions include the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall. Whole Foods Market, ACME, and one of the most well-known restaurants in Philadelphia, Zahav, are all within walking distance of the Properties. With so many local amenities you’ll never want to leave your neighborhood! 735 Spruce is also immediately catty-corner to Pennsylvania Hospital, offering nurses, residents, doctors, and employees of the nearby institution immediate access to housing.

description:

title: More than 1 available!  Check it out!
description:
Thank you for your interest in The Glen at Shawmont Station Apartments. Below is our current availability and pricing. Below you will find information on each available unit as well as pre-recorded virtual tours. If you’d like to apply to any of these units, you can do so at www.theglenphilly.com. Information regarding amenities, utilities and pets are on the the website.
The Glen at Shawmont Station is proud to host various food trucks almost weekly on the property, all are welcome to join us!
The application process is easy.
1. Locate the apartment you want to rent on www.theglenphilly.com and hit “select”.
2. Complete the application on all parts and submit with the $500.00 security deposit and $50.00 application fee.
3. Send proof of income and photo ID to  show contact info
.
4. If approved with good credit your deposit remains $500.00. Approved conditionally the deposit is one month’s rent, the $500.00 initial deposit will go towards that and you would owe the balance at move in. If denied, the deposit is refunded in check form.
5. If you decide our community is not right for you after applying, you have 72 hours from applying to cancel in writing (email) to receive your refund of the $500.00. The deposit is not refundable after 72 hours if you cancel your application.
6. Your gross monthly income (this is income before taxes) must equal three times the monthly rent to be approved. Incomes are combined.
7. Twenty-four hours before move-in, you would pay your admin/city fees of $340.00, any pet fees if applicable and the first month’s rent.

title: Relet available at Vantage Apartments - Temple University
description:
Available for re-let: one private bedroom in a two bedroom one bath B1 unit at Vantage. This is a beautiful, secure building right across the street from the center of campus (1717 North 12th Street).
One wonderful, non-smoking roommate who will be a senior. The room is only available because my student is transferring to a different school. Lease is for August 2023 to July 2024.
Each resident has their own private bedroom and own sink/vanity area in addition to the shared bathroom. Beautiful, clean and very well maintained, fully furnished apartment, including a Roku TV, with beautiful sunset views.  All utilities (including electric, water, cable, internet and laundry are included in the rent).
Vantage is a full-service luxury building with tons of amenities including:
-24/7 security desk
-Wired and wireless internet throughout the building including personal Xfinity account
- Large (12,000 sq ft.) very well equiped gym including a golf simulator.
-Large outdoor terrace with outdoor seating and huge jumbo-tron TV
-Multiple lounges, including a sky lounge, sky bridge with pool and foosball tables.
-lots of private study rooms, smart boards, and free printing.
-Mail center and package locker system
-Free hot beverage bar
-Electronic controlled access for security.
-Retail establishments right outside, including CVS, Chipotle, Five Guys, Raising Cane’s, Old Nelson, Blaze Pizza and Potbelly’s.
Rent is $1539 per month. Re-let is done through the management office for everyone's security.

The Icehouse is a very unique, cutting edge LEED Certified new construction / rehab condo complex. Common area green roof, koi pond, roof top dog park, bike room, and rooftop outdoor kitchen. Unit 1 is a studio unit with front entry, GE stainless appliances, high efficiency W/D, large Caesarstone island, glass tile bath, and hardwood floors. Directly across the street from Hetzell's ball field. The Icehouse is located 1 block from Girard Avenue. Public transportation: The (15) Trolley stops approximately two blocks from The Icehouse at the intersection of Girard and Columbia. In addition, the Girard Avenue "EL" stop (with connection available directly from the (15) trolley), is a short walk of about 10 minutes from The Icehouse.
1247 E Columbia Ave #1

title: HUGE one-bed apartment is conveniently located in elevator building!
description:
This HUGE one-bedroom apartment is conveniently located in an elevator building, just steps away from the subway, restaurants, cafes, bars, and galleries, boasting a 99 Walk Score and Transit Score. You'll love the historical integrity of this beautiful and unique unit with hardwood floors, soaring windows, and lots of natural light. The updated kitchen features white cabinetry, appliances, and granite countertops with a breakfast bar. The open concept dining and living room has high ceilings, exposed beams, and a wood-burning fireplace. The large bedroom features extensive closet space and abundant natural light. The bathroom welcomes you with a whirlpool tub, recessed lighting, and a closet with washer/dryer. Additional storage in the attic above the unit. Enjoy stunning views of Center City, the Delaware River, and Ben Franklin Bridge from the recently-renovated roof deck!
11 N 2nd St #304

title: Featuring fabulous city views from the very tall windows!
description:
Fantastic 2 bedroom/2 bathroom condominium home available for rent at The Bridgeview in the heart of Old City! Featuring fabulous city views from the very tall windows! Step into this homey and sun-filled apartment that offers a renovated kitchen with granite counter tops & is open to the spacious living room with dramatic exposed brick walls. Two generously sized bedrooms with excellent closet space & exposed brick walls. The hallway bathroom houses the washer/dryer. Sleek & stylish wood floors throughout. Central A/C. Available for immediate move-in. First, last and one month's security deposit due at lease signing. $50 application fee per applicant.
315 New St #617

title: Second floor inside a quaint 4-story brownstone on the corner of St!
description:
429 Vine Unit #2 is on the second floor inside a quaint 4-story brownstone on the corner of Vine St. The unit was recently fully renovated and features all brand new appliances, washer and dryer, flooring, bathroom, and kitchen. Inside the bedroom there is a den with it's own door that makes perfect space for an at-home office. The property is dog friendly for an additional $50/month per dog. Please no cats! Generally require first month rent, last month rent, and one month security deposit for move-in. Tenants responsible for all utilities: electricity, cable/internet, and a $50/month water fee.
